p: All of the unigenes were searched against seven public databases for functional annotation and there were 231,334 unigenes annotated in at least one database and 38,014 unigenes annotated in all of the databases (Figure S1A, Table S3). The annotation percentage was highest in the nr database and lowest in the KOG database. The Venn map revealed that 48,447 unigenes were found to be common among five databases.
